description: Bella Rossi and Izamar have met on the mats before. They are both experienced grapplers which makes this match extremely exciting. Bella Rossi really knows how to use her legs and she traps Izamar time and time again with her strong leg scissors. Izamar has brut strength and bullies her way around Bella. This Match is back and forth action for the true fans of competitive sexual grappling
title: Summer Vengeance 4th takes on 6th in the Rankings. One get Bullied
